vsParam:
There you are, [px]. Everybody's here? All right,
let us start with a quick review of the previous lessons first.

The "alchemy" you are studying allows its users to create
new things by spending Mana to alter substances.

Some say it is the "art of affinity", which is able to connect
ingredients. However, we will not go into this for the time being.

The quality of the synthesized product, [c][009C8CFF]is greatly
influenced by the quality of the ingredients[-][/c]. In other words,
the key to [c][DF1FB2FF]alchemy[-][/c] lies in [c][009C8CFF]the choice of ingredients[-][/c].

And, how to gain these ingredients...
is what I want to teach you today: gathering.

Ahem... Its time for you to practice.
First of all, you will gather some "Uni".
